title: Digital-Based History Curriculum Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic history pedagogy and understanding of curriculum development frameworks
context.additional_context: A project-based learning environment where pre-service teachers design digital history curricula using ADDIE model-based R&D methodologies and develop field-applicable instructional materials.

learning_goals: Systematically execute a digital-based history curriculum design process following the five ADDIE model phases (Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation, Evaluation)
Apply digital tool engagement strategies to history education content
Develop formative assessment tools for educational field validation and quantitatively analyze implementation results
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
